import '../CSS/Live.css' import Questions from '../data/TCSNQT1.js' import React, { useState } from 'react' function Live() { const Questionslist = Questions[0].QA; const [count, setCount] = useState(1); const totalquestions=Questions[0].TotalQuestions; const next=()=> { if(count<2) setCount(count+1); } const prev=()=> { if(count>=2) setCount(count-1); } return (

Online Examination System

Quantative

verbal

Reasoning

{/*

Q1. lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing

  1. apple
  2. apple
  3. apple
  4. apple
*/} {Questionslist.filter(q => q.No == count).map((question) => { return ( <>

Q{question.No}.

{question.Q}

  1. {question.options[0]}
  2. {question.options[1]}
  3. {question.options[2]}
  4. {question.options[3]}
) }) }
) } export default Live;
